segments.text: Hi , Jack , we are having a party tonight , wanna coming enjoy us ? You can bring your girlfriend , Tina .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't have a girlfriend . I'm single .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , that's right . Well , there are going to be many beautiful girls at the party tonight , anyway .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I like being single . I never thought lonely , I'm focus on my career . Maybe I'll start to look for my girl when I achieve success .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Because I'm living a real world , a man enriched have a good career and make a lot of money . Franklin speaking the girls I've met wounldn't married a man wounldn't make enough money .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I agree , a man needs good career.But that doesn't mean he should have a little fun , too .
segments.speaker: S1
